Key Match Events: B. Varga scored for Hungary in the 66th minute.
K. Duah scored for Switzerland in the 12th minute.
M. Aebischer scored for Switzerland in the 45th minute.
B. Embolo scored for Switzerland in the 90'+3rd minute.
Switzerland's first goal was built up from 22 passes, the third longest passing sequence leading to a goal at the European Championship since 1980.
Post-Match Reflections: Granit Xhaka was named Player of the Match.
Marco Rossi's team structure let them down in the match, especially the use of Szoboszlai.
Switzerland joined Germany on three points in Group A.
Switzerland won the match 3-1, putting themselves in an excellent position for the knockouts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Embolo scored his second consecutive European Championship goal.
Switzerland's defense held strong against Hungary's crosses into the penalty area.
